member.name: IPropertyUI.FormatForDisplay
member.summary: Developers should use instead. Gets a formatted, Unicode string representation of a property value.
member.param: A structure that contains the type and value of the property.

param.name: puiff
param.para: The format for the returned property value.
0x00000002. Use the short format version of the string.
0x00000004. Truncate time to days, not hours/mins/sec.
0x00000008. Use the friendly name for date: "Today", "Yesterday", and so on.

member.param: The property value, formatted for display.
member.returns: If this method succeeds, it returns S_OK. Otherwise, it returns an HRESULT error code.

member.name: IPropertyUI.GetDefaultWidth
member.summary: Developers should use instead. Gets the width of the property description.
member.param: The width of the property description.
member.returns: If this method succeeds, it returns S_OK. Otherwise, it returns an HRESULT error code.

member.name: IPropertyUI.GetDisplayName
member.summary: Developers should use instead. Gets a string specifying the name of the property suitable for display to users.

param.name: flags
param.para: One of the following PROPERTYUI_NAME_FLAGS values:

member.param: The length of the property display name.
member.returns: If this method succeeds, it returns S_OK. Otherwise, it returns an HRESULT error code.

member.name: IPropertyUI.GetFlags
member.summary: Developers should use instead. Gets property feature flags for a specified property.
member.returns: If this method succeeds, it returns S_OK. Otherwise, it returns an HRESULT error code.

member.name: IPropertyUI.GetHelpInfo
member.param: The fully qualified path of the Help file.
The Help context ID for the property.
member.returns: If this method succeeds, it returns S_OK. Otherwise, it returns an HRESULT error code.

member.name: IPropertyUI.GetPropertyDescription
member.summary: Developers should use instead. Gets the property description of a specified property.
member.param: The length of the property description.
member.returns: If this method succeeds, it returns S_OK. Otherwise, it returns an HRESULT error code.

member.name: IPropertyUI.ParsePropertyName
member.summary: Developers should use instead. Reads the characters of the specified property name and identifies the FMTID and PROPID of the property.
member.param: A string specifying the property name to parse.
The FMTID of the parsed property.
The PROPID of the parsed property name.
The number of characters that were consumed in parsing pszName.
member.returns: If this method succeeds, it returns S_OK. Otherwise, it returns an HRESULT error code.
